    • Method Detail

      • createCoverContainer

        public static javafx.scene.layout.StackPane createCoverContainer(javafx.scene.layout.FlowPane container,
                                                                 java.lang.String title,
                                                                 javafx.scene.image.ImageView cover)
        Create the container for displaying a series cover, for use in FlowPane layouts where covers are shown in a somewhat grid-like fashion.
        Parameters:
        container - the parent FlowPane container
        title - the title of the series being represented
        cover - the cover of the series being represented; this ImageView is not modified, a copy is made to be used in the new container
        Returns:
        a StackPane which displays the provided title and cover and can be added to the FlowPane

      • setChildButtonVisible

        public static void setChildButtonVisible(javafx.scene.Parent parent,
                                         boolean visible)
        Set whether all Button children of the given Parent are visible.
        Parameters:
        parent - the parent node
        visible - whether the buttons should be visible
